label.description: The label locator is used to refer to a labelled part of the brain, such as a brain region.

parcellation.description: Acronym of the label volume that the second parameter refers to. The key must be present in the 'labelVolumes' dictionary in the atlas definition file.

region.description: Acronym of the labelled part of the brain. It must be present in the 'acr2index' dictionary of the labelVolume.

vertex.description: The vertex locator is used to refer to a vertex on a surface mesh.
